error.UNSUPPORT_VERSION: Your server version is not supported.

error.WRONG_DATA: Wrong data returend from your server.
error.SOCKET_CLOSE: Disconnected to the server. Please log in.
error.SOCKET_ERROR: Failed to connect to the server. Unknown error.
error.KICKOFF: Your account has logge in elsewhere. If it is not you, change your password immediately.
error.USER_DATA_PATH_DENY: User data is not available. Try again.
error.USER_DENY_ATTACT_UPLOAD: You don't have the privilege to upload files. Contact your Admin.
error.UPLOAD_FILE_IS_TOO_LARGE: Failed to uploadit. File <= {0} can be uploaded.
error.SERVER_DISABLED_UPLOAD: File uploading failed. File uploading is disabled on your server.
error.STATUS_401: Use the correct account and password.
error.Unauthorized: User authentication failed. Wrong account or password.
error.SERVER_VERSION_NOT_SUPPORT: Your current client（{0}）is not compatible with the server version {1}. Server version should be {2} +.
error.SERVER_VERSION_NOT_SUPPORT_IN_BROW: Your browser（{0}）is not compatible with the server version {1}. Server version should be {2} +.
error.RANZHI_SERVER_NOTSET: Zdoo server setting is not found.

setting.hotkeys.cantSetOnlyMotifyKeys: Hot key should not be all modifier keys(Ctrl, Alt/Option, Shift, Windows/Command). It should have a general key at least.
